code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AnswerForm=_ref=>{let{tokenRef,question,setPage}=_ref;const[studentAnswer,setStudentAnswer]=useState('');const[responseHtml,setResponseHtml]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();submitAnswer();};const submitAnswer=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/answer',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({id:question.id,answer:studentAnswer})});const data=await response.json();tokenRef.current=data.token;setResponseHtml(data.html);}catch(error){console.error('Error submitting answer:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Your Answer:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:studentAnswer,onChange:e=>setStudentAnswer(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:responseHtml&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:responseHtml}})})]});};export default AnswerForm;
